Amplifier Book

This is a small, static "mental model" website for understanding Amplifier's architecture: the kernel, bundles, modules, recipes, and how applications compose them into AI-powered systems.

What You'll Learn
  • Bundles - How to configure and compose AI capabilities
  • Modules - The plugin system (providers, tools, hooks)
  • Recipes - Multi-step AI workflows
  • Building apps - Web apps, services, custom tools

The CLI is just one example app. This book teaches the platform underneath.

What’s “available” in this book

Lists in this book are generated by scanning the Amplifier ecosystem repos and extracting concrete facts (modules, profiles, agents, and bundled collections) into data/catalog.json.
